class.name: NNSTStateIsActiveGuard
class.brief_description: Checks if a given state is active.
class.description: This guard is used to check if the given [member state] is active.

method.name: is_satisfied
method.description: Checks if the [member state] is active. Returns [code]true[/code] if the state is active, [code]false[/code] otherwise.
